alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 11:55AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Montana, including the following counties, Beaverhead and Madison. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 AM MST, emergency management reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dillon, Twin Bridges, Alder and Beaverhead Rock State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
